stories.text:
https://VacanBox.com Hi, I have been working on a marketplace startup to which connects hosts with extra space to individuals looking for storage space. It's just been a month and half, and I have launched the website for hosts, where hosts can sign up, add a listing, and connect payment through Stripe. As startups should launch quick and get feedback, improve and repeat, I am trying to get some feedback for my website when I am also working to get some hosts on our website. We already have 8 paying customers and we are taking orders manually and processing them, after getting positive feedback, I want to automate the process and let my website do all the work.

Any suggestions, advice or positive feedback is appreciated.

https://VacanBox.com I really appreciate your time.
